001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.service;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.Game;
004import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.Guess;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
006import retrofit2.http.Body;
007import retrofit2.http.GET;
008import retrofit2.http.POST;
009import retrofit2.http.Path;
010
011public interface CodebreakerServiceProxy {
012
013  @POST("games")
014  Single<Game> startGame(@Body Game game);
015
016  @GET("games/{id}")
017  Single<Game> getGame(@Path("id") String id);
018
019  @POST("games/{id}/guesses")
020  Single<Guess> submitGuess(@Path("id") String gameId, @Body Guess guess);
021
022}
